book.synopsis: Elric of Melnibone, an albino prince, travels in the Ship Which Sails Over Land and Sea to the city of Dhoz-Kam, through the Shade Gate to the Pulsing Cavern where the magic swords Stormbringer and Mournblade await him
book.dimensions: Height: 7 Inches, Length: 4.25 Inches, Weight: 0.2 Pounds, Width: 0.5 Inches
